text: "Ride Like the Wind" is a 1980 debut single by Christopher Cross. It is the leading single from his debut studio album Christopher Cross. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 3 in Canada, number 25 in Australia, number 31 in New Zealand and number 69 in the United Kingdom. The single is dedicated to singer Lowell George who died in 1979.
